name: Tick Tock Trouble (CodingCrate, ⁣tickMark)
description:
Tick Tock Trouble 

Made by:

CodingCrate: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTr4eujULBVT89UQzCV57XA

tickMark: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClNZlDQGf3iMjOr5P0clw1Q

https://tickmark.itch.io/

Tutorial:

Escape the METRONOME MAZE by TRANSFORMING into different ANIMALS to help you FIND the 3 KEYS to the door that leads out.

A/D to move

Space to jump

T to teleport back to spawn point without losing progress

Icons from: www.icons8.com

Turtle sprite: Animal clipart vector created by brgfx - www.freepik.com

Toucan sprite: Beak vector created by brgfx - www.freepik.com

Key: Key vector created by freepik - www.freepik.com

Known bugs & glitches
  • The tucan music is clipping, i'm  really sorry for your ears
  • If you collect a pickup right before the dice rolls, the pickup won't do anything
